title: REQUIREMENTS FOR THE LEGAL CHANGE OF NAME OF  USER

sub1li.li: Prove ownership and / or possession of the property by:

subli.li: Copy of deed title, duly endorsed purchase contract, letter or possession, or any document certifying the legal possession of the property issued by regulatory body (CORET, CRETT ó INVISUR)

sub1li.li: Legal constitution of Condominial administration (if necessary)
Administrator notarized power of attorney and a copy of valid official ID (if necessary)
Copy of in force official identification of the owner
The status of drinking water intake is ACTIVE
There shall be no debt on the property for which it is requested the change of data.

sub2: If it is leased, the above plus:

sub2li.li: Written consent of the lessor (proxy letter)
Copy of official identification in force of the tenant.

sub31li.li: Prove ownership and / or possession of the property by:

subli.li: Copy of deed title, duly endorsed purchase contract, letter or possession

sub31li.li: Copy of in force official identification of the owner
There shall be no debt on the property for which it is requested the change of data
The status of the drinking water intake is  ACTIVE
Legal constitution of Condominial administration (if necessary)
Notarized power of  Administrator and a copy of in force official ID (if necessary)
Operating license and / or registration in Secretaria de Hacienda.

sub32: If it is leased, the above plus:

sub32li.li: Written consent of the lessor (proxy letter)
Copy of official identification in force of the tenant.

sub33li.li: Prove of ownership and / or possession of the property by:

subli.li: Copy of deed title, duly endorsed purchase contract, letter or possession

sub33li.li: Copy of official identification in force of the tenant
There shall be no debt on the property for which it is requested the change of data
The status of the drinking water intake is  ACTIVE
Legal constitution of Condominial administration (if necessary)
Notarized power of  Administrator and a copy of in force official ID (if necessary))
Operating license and / or registration in Secretaria de Hacienda
Copy of charter of the company
Copia del poder notarial del representante legal
Copy of in force official identification of the legal representative.

sub34: If it is leased, the above plus:

sub34li.li: Written consent of the lessor (proxy letter)
Copy of official identification in force of the tenant.
